originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Smoke rises above Qatar capital Doha after Iranian missiles shot down
title: Smoke rises above Qatar capital Doha after Iranian missiles shot down
content: Loud explosions have been heard in Doha, the capital of Qatar, as defence systems shot down incoming Iranian missiles.

originalTitle: World reacts to killing of Iran’s Khamenei by US, Israel forces
title: World reacts to killing of Iran’s Khamenei by US, Israel forces
content: Several nations, global bodies and prominent groups respond to killing of Iran's supreme leader, urging de-escalation.

originalTitle: Who could succeed Ayatollah Ali Khamenei to lead Iran?
title: Who could succeed Ayatollah Ali Khamenei to lead Iran?
content: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's assassination brings Iran's clerics the colossal task of picking his successor.

originalTitle: At least 148 dead after reported strike on school, Iran says
title: At least 148 dead after reported strike on school, Iran says
content: Iran has blamed the US and Israel for the strike; the US is looking into reports of the incident, while the IDF says it is "not aware" of operations in the area.

originalTitle: One killed and 11 injured at Dubai and Abu Dhabi airports as Iran strikes region
title: One killed and 11 injured at Dubai and Abu Dhabi airports as Iran strikes region
content: Falling debris from intercepted Iranian drones and missiles cause widespread damage across the Gulf.

originalTitle: What we know so far about the US-Israel attacks and Iran's retaliation
title: What we know so far about the US-Israel attacks and Iran's retaliation
content: Iran responds by launching missiles and drones towards Israel and four Gulf Arab countries that host US military bases.

originalTitle: 'Not fair to fans' - how VAR denied Burnley one of greatest comebacks
title: 'Not fair to fans' - how VAR denied Burnley one of greatest comebacks
content: Burnley were set to complete one of the greatest Premier League comebacks - until VAR intervened. BBC Sport takes a look at whether the decisions were correct.

originalTitle: Free-scoring Semenyo takes burden off Haaland
title: Free-scoring Semenyo takes burden off Haaland
content: Manchester City have often been accused of being too reliant on Erling Haaland this season. There are signs that could be changing.

originalTitle: Arsenal set to celebrate St Totteringham's Day earlier than ever
title: Arsenal set to celebrate St Totteringham's Day earlier than ever
content: The day it becomes impossible for Spurs to finish above Arsenal in the Premier League, St Totteringham's Day is set to arrive earlier than ever.
